content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the parties involved the defendant was ordered to pay a total of €504 in legal fees which includes fees for the plaintiffs legal representation and the courts legal fees the court considered the defendants obligations towards creditors and awarded the applicant a car called opel vectra station wagon as their personal property the defendant was also awarded a car called opel vectra as their personal property the court dissolved the marriage due to mutual fault and is now considering the defendants obligations towards creditors the defendant has been ordered to pay additional costs for stamp duty legal aid and procedural documents

metadata.cost: 296.00 EUR (legal fees) + 208.00 EUR (court and legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
